name: Ranger Grant
descriptions: Ranger Grant is an NCR Ranger coordinating security during President Kimball's visit and speech at Hoover Dam in 2281.

Grant is a long time NCR ranger, best described as the "shoot first, never ask questions" type of soldier, someone who doesn't mind going into combat, so long as his soldiers shoot alongside him. He was injured at one point during his service. He also seems to enjoy (and even volunteer for) more dangerous missions.
Despite wearing his eyepatch on his right eye, he takes aim using that eye. This is due to the aiming animation only being for right eye dominant characters.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Not now!

topics.topic_text: I found a bomb on the President's vertibird.
topics.response_text: A bomb on the President's vertibird? Only a limited number of people had access to the vertibird.

topics.topic_text: I found an assassin in the tower.
topics.response_text: Damnit! I can't believe the Legion actually got someone past our security. Good job catching him.

topics.topic_text: I found a detonator on that man over there.
topics.response_text: What the hell? This must control some sort of bomb that he was going to use to kill the President.

topics.topic_text: <Starting Converstation for VMQ03a>
topics.response_text: I've heard of you. I'm glad you're here to help us out. This is a delicate matter and we need all the help we can get from people we can trust.

topics.topic_text: We're all fine here, thank you. How are you?
topics.response_text: {Radio}Quit goofing off and clear the channel. I'll be damned if the President dies on my watch because you were screwing around.

topics.topic_text: I'm all set.
topics.response_text: Good. The President doesn't arrive until tomorrow. Get some rest, I'll brief you in the morning.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready. When will the President be here?
topics.response_text: Looks like that's his vertibird coming right now. It's show time, let's not mess this up.

topics.topic_text: I need to prepare first.
topics.response_text: Make it quick.

topics.topic_text: I have some questions.
topics.response_text: Ask your questions, but keep it short.

topics.topic_text: <Ranger Graham Morning Conversation>
topics.response_text: Glad you could join us. Most of my men are already on duty and the crowd has already started gathering outside.

topics.topic_text: Can I use my weapons during the President's visit?
topics.response_text: We trust you, so you're free to have your weapons. Just don't do anything too crazy and we'll back you up.

topics.topic_text: Not yet.
topics.response_text: Well, hurry it up. We don't have much time.

topics.topic_text: What are your security arrangements?
topics.response_text: Security detail consists of rangers stationed here at the dam. Some will keep an eye on the crowd while others will watch the perimeter.

topics.topic_text: Do you have a detailed schedule for the visit?
topics.response_text: I have a full itinerary here. Here you go.

topics.topic_text: Do you have any leads on possible security threats?
topics.response_text: The Legion will definitely try something, but we don't have any solid leads yet.

topics.topic_text: What can I do to help?
topics.response_text: Someone like you... I'm just glad to have you on board. Do whatever you can. Security sweeps, talk to people, keep an eye out.

topics.topic_text: So what's the plan for today?
topics.response_text: The plan is to get through today without the shit hitting the fan.

topics.topic_text: Let's get this show on the road.
topics.response_text: President Kimball is arriving shortly. If you want to do any last minute security sweeps or take a look around for anything suspicious, do it now.

topics.topic_text: I've made my preparations. Let's get started.
topics.response_text: Good. The President doesn't arrive until tomorrow. Let's get some rest and we'll have a brief talk first thing in the morning.

topics.topic_text: I'm done with questions.
topics.response_text: If there's nothing else, then let's get moving.

topics.topic_text: I'm going to need access everywhere.
topics.response_text: Alright, I'll give you full access.

topics.topic_text: I have access, right?
topics.response_text: Not a chance. Only the necessary personnel have authorization.

topics.topic_text: Sounds good.
topics.response_text: {Sarcastic}Well I'm glad I have your approval.

topics.topic_text: No more questions.
topics.response_text: If there's nothing else, then let's get moving.

topics.topic_text: I found a Legion sniper on the roof of the tower.
topics.response_text: {Radio}Damnit! I can't believe the Legion actually got someone past our security. Good job catching him.

topics.topic_text: Nothing to report.
topics.response_text: {Radio}Then stay off the line and get back to work!
